tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE task_list (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR,
  task_description VARCHAR,
  deadline DATE
)
CREATE TABLE tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255), task_description TEXT, deadline_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255), project_description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE user_tasks (user_id INT, task_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE user_tasks (
    user_task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    completed BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES task_lists(id)
);
